title: Cet- learning apps for childern in hebrew
description:
this are application/games by CET in HEBREW for teaching children to read in hebrew/english and learning math.

all of the apps are working under windows xp/windows-7 only on 32-bit mode. 

each app on is own rar file , so after extraction just lunch the setup file on each folder to install them.

2 apps if i recall, doesnt have setup installtion file , then just drag and drop where ever you want and create shortcut to the open.exe file.

i hope your children will have fun and if you find those apps helpful , 
please consider buying them.

Enjoy.

p.s

if you have problems seeing the installation dialog on hebrew 

go to the languge settings on your windows control panel regional settings and change the location to israel ! and maybe the format also to hebrew . 
if that not helps check on google, there is info about it and for sure it works.
